title: Simulation
description: Simulation configuration schema. Specify an experiment using multiple engines and transceiver functions.

SimulationTimeout.description: Experiment Timeout (in seconds). 0 means no timeout

SimulationTimestep.description: Time in seconds the simulation advances in between processing client requests.

ProcessLauncherType.description: Process Launcher Type. Can be used to change the way engine processes are started

EngineConfigs.description: Engines that will be started in the experiment

TransceiverFunctionConfigs.description: Transceiver functions that will be used in the experiment
